name: Carnival: Funfair Games
synopsis: Come and see! Lots of entertaining carnival games are waiting for you, such as the new Clown Bash, Bumper Boats, Wild West Exhibit... A frenetic combination of buttons, blows, screams and maneuvers with the Nintendo DS stylus that makes Frogs fly, balloons explode and ducks quack! Enter Carnival: Funfair Games and let the fun begin!
